author: sussman
msg: Make sure all of the various authentication runtime options are
honored by the "new" auth system.  This is necessary before we can
* svn_auth.h: better document policies regarding 'global' runtime auth
parameters that live in the auth_baton hash.
global runtime parameters, visible to all providers.
* main.c (main): if the user passed --non-interactive, store the new
parameter in the auth_baton hash.  store the no-auth-cache parameter
if the user either used --no-auth-cache or set 'store-password = no'.
Also, don't register the prompt provider if we have --non-interactive.
no-auth-cache parameter is in the auth hash, then don't save creds.

author: cmpilato
msg: (simple_prompt_next_creds): Re-work to use new get_creds() helper.
